prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a living mountain with a fierce expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that has arms made of boulders and a rocky exterior, perfect for defense.
Generate a Pokemon design inspired by geological formations, emphasizing strength and resilience.
Show me a Pokemon with a stone-like body and powerful legs, ready for ground battles.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a giant rock creature, showcasing its rugged and tough nature.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of earth and rock, with a sturdy build.
Give me a Pokemon that can roll into a ball and has a tough rocky shell.
